author: Janis Froehlig
comment: but I can't figure it out. I set it up for a voice command from the watch, but then what? Not all my task names are pronounceable, but is that what triggers the task? Nothing on the website. Using a competitor's product for now (has 3 slots for voice commands), or maybe a hacky work around with AutoVoice with my phone's microphone.

reply.author: Millard Consulting, LLC
reply.content: Because of limitations in the way Android Wear voice commands work, only a single task is supported for voice command. You do not need to say the name of the task; "okay Google, start task" is all that is required.

title: Looks promising

author: Sebastien Vayrette-Gavard
comment: I wish the battery monitoring let you pick the level because an "okay" battery or low battery is very subjective. I also wish the "start task" could trigger more than one task and be more natural elegant, "Ok Google, open the garage"
title: poorly implemented not worth a buck

author: Connor Verity
comment: The charging detection doesn't work anymore on my moto 360. Even if its charging, the task for not-charging is still going and not the charging task (which is just mute/unmute my phone). If this can be fixed, I'll give 5/5
title: Was great while it worked

author: Sergey Udaltsov
comment: After upgrade to 6.0.1, the watch does not report the charging state any more. At all. Is there upgrade planned?
title: Unreliable

author: Tim Fenton
comment: Correct me if I'm wrong but it appears I can only have 1 task? Hardly useful... would be nice to have multiple
title: Could be better

author: Ken Weise
comment: Currently I only use this to monitor connection state to my phone and turn on/off the pattern unlock. I would love to be able to adjust screen brightness, run actions based on number of steps, change the device interface (turn mute and theater mode on/off), etc.
title: Good, but needs more actions

author: Marlin Thai
comment: I used to use this plug in to turn on priority mode on and off whenever the watch was charging or taken off the charger. It hasn't worked ever since the last android wear update..
title: Not working anymore?

author: Gustavo
comment: Was working great but now doesn't work with 5.1.1 update.

author: Paul Hetherington
comment: Works as promised.  "Okay Google - Start Task" now opens my garage door.  How cool is that.  Developer is responsive and helpful also.
title: Nice App
